talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
Master Archer Ithilien... If she was the member of Silver Crescent Archers, if she was the clever Elf, then I remember her.

$General Douglas$
Master Archer Ithilien is a counter knight who participated the war 50 years ago.
With such a brave knight fighting along us, I could breathe better now.

$Bishop Ignacio$
How is the Prophet doing? I know Geraint is treating her very well, but I am a bit worried since I cannot see her.
Haha... This is just an old man's worry for nothing.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The incident, Rain of Plague and the blood of Black Dragon...
50 years ago, same as this time, we found a lot of victims even after ending of Dragon's Raid.

$Bishop Ignacio$
How is the Prophet doing? I know Geraint is treating her very well, but I am a bit worried since I cannot see her.
Haha... This is just an old man's worry for nothing.

$General Douglas$
Master Archer Ithilien is a counter knight who participated the war 50 years ago.
With such a brave knight fighting along us, I could breathe better now.

$Geraint$
You came here again because you are worried about the descendant of the Ancients, am I right?
Don't be worried. Nobody cannot get in here except you and Argenta. Trust me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Ithilien slurs the end of her sentence.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Archer Ithilien$
I have not found the complete Treatment yet.
If we had the treatment, then The One did not has to accept the destiny...

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I am sorry. I didn't mean to freak you out. I was just talking to myself.
Anyway, many people including Cynthia are looking to find the treatment, but we have not found anything yet.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
We cannot cure right now, but we can contain the symptom temporarily.
The medicine effect duration is based on indivivual's mental strength

$Master Archer Ithilien$
It is called Spirit Teardrop that you can only find at the Spirit Grave Tomb.
If you bring Spirit Teardrop to me I will try to make a medicine with it.
I memorized the prescription for the medicine.

$Master Archer Ithilien${action:talk}
Please get me a Spirit Teardrop that you can only find at the Spirit Grave Tomb. Spirits of water has been disapeared a long time ago but, you may find some teardrops from stronger monsters.

$Master Archer Ithilien${action:talk}
Then I will make the medicine.
Once completed I would delivered it to the wounded soldiers imediately. Please report to General Douglas.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The land has been contaminated because of the Black Dragon's blood. The land of the Goddess will face the chaos if innocent lives get infected.
I hope we can find the treatment as soon as possible so that we can break out of a vicious circle.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I saved a lot of time because of you.
I will send the medicine to the injured soldiers treatment place as soon as it completes, so please report to General Douglas.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The black dragon's blood was the cause of the disease.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
Does Master Archer Ithilien know the cause for the diseases?

$General Douglas${action:Talk}
The evil monster is still damaging our troops even after it dies.
Though, because of her, officers are minimizing their losses. But we need to have the complete treatment because this will only work for a temporary expedient. .

$General Douglas$
I, Douglas will take the responsibility for caring officers.
I will not give up until the day we find the treatment.
If they are completely ignoring our troops, then who will fight for our nation?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You are too generous with your compliments.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$general Douglas$
I got your help this time again. Thank you very much.
(General Douglas is strongly shaking your hand.)
I will never fOgret your loyalty.
Now I know why Ignacio highly praised you.

$General Douglas$
Since you have the full confidence of Ignacio, you must be very busy. Thank you very much for your help even though you are busy. My business is over now so go return to Bishop Ignacio.

$General Douglas$
Huh? Didn't you go see Bishop Ignacio?
Haha. He has the full confidence on you. You should visit him every so often.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Welcome, Saint Haven's true friend.
Today as same as everyday, I was worried with my deep anxiety.

$Bishop Ignacio$
I know Geraint is protecting her and with her every minute. But I was worried what if some evil monsters attack the underground place while our Prophet is asleep?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I am a bit worried about that too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
I do, I do trust him. But you know how we weakened the Black Dragon's Nest with the Ancient Celebrant's Rune.
I am just worry about if someone weakens our nest with the rune.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Could you go talk to Geraint about the part that we just discussed?
The problem might occurs even with the tiny suspicion so hopefully Geraint does not feel offended that we are asking about it.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
I am worried because someone might break into the Gold Dragon's Nest. Since we actually weakened the Black Dragon's Nest with the Ancient Celebrant's Rune, we cannot so sure that nobody ever break into the Nest.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Could you go talk to Geraint about the part that we just discussed?
The problem might occurs even with the tiny suspicion so hopefully Geraint does not feel offended that we are asking about it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But are you not the same as them?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
If it's the Ancient Celebrant's Rune, then you don't have to worry about it.
I could weaken the Nest with the Celebrant's Rune because the Black Dragon from this time and the Black Dragon from 50 years ago was created by using Ancient's strength.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We? Do you mean you and Argenta?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
The Descendant of Chaos and we are different.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I see... (I didn't know Argenta is a dragon.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Yes. Me and Argenta, we are the only Descendant of Sentinel.
At least I know of.

$Geraint$
It seems like you don't have any other business.
Go back to him who sent you here.

$Geraint$
The Nest is inviolable territory. If someone break into the Nest, then that someone cannot exhibit their full strength as long as the owner stays alive.
So tell those humans that they don't have to worry about it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He said, no need to be worried.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
You are here.
What did Geraint say?

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hm... I see. So each dragon receives different effects of strength.
Okay. So someone cannot break into the Next with the Ancient Celebrant's Rune. I'm so relief to hear that news.

$Bishop Ignacio$
You can enter the place because... What did you say last time? Because... Oh! Some kind of pendent that you received from Geraint, am I right?
Can I take a look at it?

$Bishop Ignacio$
What a delicate workmanship this is. I can't believe I am actually seeing a dragon's item. What a rare sight.
Make sure you don't lose it.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Location of the medicine
journal.contents:
Talk to Master Archer Ithilien about the Medicine.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Master Archer Ithilien

journal.title: Collect the Spirit Teardrop
journal.contents:
Collect the Spirit Teardrop at Spirit Grave Tomb. It seems like you have make the medicine with Spirit Teardrop. It seems like the strongest monter has the spirit teardrop.

Hermalte Port(River Ruins Path) → Graves of Unrest
journal.destination: Collect the Spirit Teardrop at Spirit Grave Tomb
journal.todo_msg: Obtain the Spirit Teardrop at Spirit Grave Tomb

journal.title: Master Archer Ithilien's Medicine
journal.contents:
You have been collected the Spirit Teardrop. Return and report to Master Archer Ithilienn.

Saint Haven → Master Archer Ithilien
journal.todo_msg: Please deliver the Spirit Teardrop to Master Archer Ithilien.

journal.title: Report to the General
journal.contents:
Master Archer Ithilien said she will make the medicine. Report the situation to General Douglas.

Saint Haven → General Douglas
journal.todo_msg: You have been completed the request. Please report to General Douglas.

journal.title: Other business
journal.contents:
You have completed all the business. Go to Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Bishop Ignacio if he has other business for you.

journal.title: Ask Geraint
journal.contents:
Can Ancient Celebrate's Rune also weaken the Geraint's Nest? Since Bishop Ignacio is concerned about this. Please talk to Geraint and confirm with him about thist.

Saint Haven (Underground Secret Region) → Geraint
journal.todo_msg: Please deliver the Bishop Ignacio's question to Geraint.

journal.title: The Dragon's Response
journal.contents:
Return the answer from Geraint to Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Please pass Geraint's answer to Bishop Ignacio
